title: Your Project?
para1: If you are looking to hire a versatile, capable and motivated software developer for freelance, contract or more long-term employment please do not hesitate to contact me. I am open to any and all work offers.
para2: For personal and professional examples of my work you may browse this website. For personal projects (including this website), all of the design and implementation work is my own. I would not label myself a designer; however, I am a perfectionist and I always strive to make my projects look and feel well-designed.
